thread.title: Priyanka Chopra Looks Ravishingly Hot At The Oscar Awards 2017
thread.title_full: Priyanka Chopra Looks Ravishingly Hot At The Oscar Awards 2017

author: Vasundhara Garg
title: Priyanka Chopra Looks Ravishingly Hot At The Oscar Awards 2017
text:
IN Celebrities ON 27 Feb, 2017 Priyanka Chopra Looks Ravishingly Hot At The Oscar Awards 2017 Share on twitter Follow Us On 
You name Oscars (or rather any other award ceremony for that matter!) and what strikes is celebs dressed in haute couture, giving cut-throat competition to each other with their elaborate ensembles. We are more than happy to grab the glimpses of the 89th Academy Awards, where the Hollywood has been oozing out with fashion. Not to forget the sensational Indian beauty, Priyanka Chopra has been creating hustle as well. 
The gorgeous babe graced the red carpet of Oscars 2017 in a splendid white Ralph and Russo tulle strapless gown. Her curves were heavily complimented with the deep split corset. The ivory white colour suited her well. While the Oscars are being hosted at the Dolby Theatre, Los Angeles, USA, fans all across the world are drooling over the gorgeous photographs of their fav stars! 
Catch the radiant beauty in the pictures below. Priyanka Chopra Looks Ravishingly Hot At The Oscar Awards 2017 754 396
